Header: 14 Division Joins ‘Ranaviru Haritha Arana’ Tree Planting
Content: To coincide with the national tree planting drive,’Wanaropa’, 14 Division troops in keeping with the Army-initiated ‘Ranaviru Haritha Arana’ launched their tree planting  projects in all units under the Division on Saturday (27). Accordingly, 143 Bridge troops,16 Gajaba Regiment and 1 Sri Lanka National Guard troops planted Naa, Rambutan, Durian, Mahogany, Jack, Mangoes, Kumbuk,Teak, Ebony, Cashew, Pawatta, Orange, Pomegranate,  Coconut,  seedlings  in their  respective  premises  in the 14 Division on the instructions  of Major  General  Ralph Nugera, General Officer Commanding, 14 Division. Under  this programme, more than 100 seedlings were  planted  in parallel with the main programme at Manik farm, organized  by  the Directorate of Agriculture and Livestock.
